# App Store Connect API 1.7 release notes

**Article**

Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.

## Overview

App Store Connect API version 1.7 provides resources that enable you to automate actions you take in App Store Connect.

### New features

- The new resources in [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-events-and-metadata] support scheduling and managing in-app events, including [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-events], [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-event-video-clips], [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-event-screenshots], and [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-event-localizations].
- New resources support creating and managing your appâ€™s custom product pages, including [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-custom-product-pages], [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-custom-product-page-versions], and [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-custom-product-page-localizations].
- The [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-store-version-experiments] resource now supports creating and managing product page optimization treatments.
- The [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/review-submissions] and [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/review-submission-items] resources support the updated App Store submission process, which lets you submit multiple items, submit without a new app version, and retrieve the submission statuses.

### Deprecations

- The [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-store-version-submissions] resource and all its related endpoints and objects are now deprecated, including: `POST-v1-appStoreVersionSubmissions`, [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/DELETE-v1-appStoreVersionSubmissions-_id_], [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/AppStoreVersionSubmission], `AppStoreVersionSubmissionCreateRequest`, and [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/AppStoreVersionSubmissionResponse].

## Versions

- **App Store Connect API 4.1 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
- **App Store Connect API 4.0 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.

- **App Store Connect API 3.3 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
- **App Store Connect API 3.2 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
